# Requirements for Fractional PINO Experiment
# Install with: pip install -r requirements_fractional_pino.txt

# Core hpfracc library
hpfracc>=0.1.0

# PyTorch for neural networks
torch>=1.12.0
torchvision>=0.13.0

# Scientific computing
numpy>=1.21.0
scipy>=1.7.0

# Visualization
matplotlib>=3.5.0
seaborn>=0.11.0

# JAX for additional optimizations (optional)
jax>=0.4.0
jaxlib>=0.4.0

# NUMBA for JIT compilation (optional)
numba>=0.56.0

# Additional utilities
tqdm>=4.64.0
pandas>=1.3.0
